attributes.action: could we please benefit from reduced interest rate!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Along with many others, I have taken a mortgage on fixed rate of 6% in Feb'08 for two years. Now the interest is down but I am paying same rate. I pleaded to my lender Birmingham Midshires to reduce interest rates but they flatly refused. I am a victim of this credit crunch and struggling to pay mortgage, bills and loans. Could the Government kindly help me(us)please!
